hobbies.name: Videogames
descriptions: I am a passionate, nerdy gamer. My passion for programming and exploring the universe came from early memories of playing Majora's Mask and several SNES titles.
I love indie games and particularly titles that encourage cooperation or collaborative play. Big fan of multiplayer.
I also recently began being a Dungeon Master for a D&D campaign with friends, for which I have been writing lore, creating custom monsters and encounters, and even an app for users to interact with.

Since before highschool it was my dream to make videogames, and I made several unfinished and small projects over the years. At one point making a 3D platformer with gravity mechanics 
dependent on individual platform's gravity well shapes as a project senior year in highschool.
It is still my goal to one day develop videogames at some level or another, and to publish one of my own works.
